Name:
Boreas
Salamis
Fate:
Loaned to the Royal Hellenic Navy, 10 February 1944

Returned to the Royal Navy, 9 October 1951
Sold for scrap, 15 April 1952
Displacement:
1,360 long tons (1,380 t) (standard)
1,790 long tons (1,820 t) (deep load)
Range: 4,800 nmi (8,900 km; 5,500 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
4 × single 4.7 in (120 mm) guns
2 × single 2-pdr (40 mm) AA guns
2 × quadruple 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
20 × depth charges, 1 rail and 2 throwers
